abilities.name: stench
abilities.text_entry: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: drizzle
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: speed-boost
abilities.text_entry: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

abilities.name: battle-armor
abilities.text_entry: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.text_entry: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.text_entry: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

abilities.name: limber
abilities.text_entry: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: static
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: volt-absorb
abilities.text_entry: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.text_entry: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: oblivious
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

abilities.name: cloud-nine
abilities.text_entry: Eliminates the effects of weather.

abilities.name: compound-eyes
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.

abilities.name: insomnia
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

abilities.name: color-change
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

abilities.name: immunity
abilities.text_entry: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.text_entry: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.

abilities.name: shield-dust
abilities.text_entry: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: own-tempo
abilities.text_entry: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

abilities.name: suction-cups
abilities.text_entry: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

abilities.name: shadow-tag
abilities.text_entry: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadow to prevent it from escaping.

abilities.name: rough-skin
abilities.text_entry: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.

abilities.name: wonder-guard
abilities.text_entry: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

abilities.name: levitate
abilities.text_entry: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.text_entry: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.text_entry: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

abilities.name: natural-cure
abilities.text_entry: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

abilities.name: lightning-rod
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves.  Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves,  it boosts its Sp. Atk.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring  when attacking.

abilities.name: swift-swim
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

abilities.name: chlorophyll
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: illuminate
abilities.text_entry: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

abilities.name: trace
abilities.text_entry: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

abilities.name: huge-power
abilities.text_entry: Doubles the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: inner-focus
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.

abilities.name: magma-armor
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

abilities.name: water-veil
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: magnet-pull
abilities.text_entry: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.

abilities.name: soundproof
abilities.text_entry: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full  immunity to all sound-based moves.

abilities.name: rain-dish
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

abilities.name: sand-stream
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: pressure
abilities.text_entry: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.

abilities.name: flame-body
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.text_entry: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: keen-eye
abilities.text_entry: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon’s accuracy.

abilities.name: hyper-cutter
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

abilities.name: truant
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon can’t use a move the following turn if it uses one.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: plus
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

abilities.name: minus
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

abilities.name: forecast
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

abilities.name: sticky-hold
abilities.text_entry: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: shed-skin
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.text_entry: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

abilities.name: marvel-scale
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.

abilities.name: liquid-ooze
abilities.text_entry: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.

abilities.name: overgrow
abilities.text_entry: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.text_entry: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

abilities.name: torrent
abilities.text_entry: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

abilities.name: swarm
abilities.text_entry: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

abilities.name: rock-head
abilities.text_entry: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: drought
abilities.text_entry: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: arena-trap
abilities.text_entry: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

abilities.name: vital-spirit
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

abilities.name: white-smoke
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: pure-power
abilities.text_entry: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

abilities.name: shell-armor
abilities.text_entry: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

abilities.name: air-lock
abilities.text_entry: Eliminates the effects of weather.

abilities.name: tangled-feet
abilities.text_entry: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

abilities.name: motor-drive
abilities.text_entry: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.text_entry: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

abilities.name: steadfast
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: snow-cloak
abilities.text_entry: Boosts evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.text_entry: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

abilities.name: anger-point
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

abilities.name: unburden
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon’s held item is  used or lost.

abilities.name: heatproof
abilities.text_entry: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

abilities.name: simple
abilities.text_entry: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.

abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.text_entry: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: download
abilities.text_entry: Compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

abilities.name: iron-fist
abilities.text_entry: Powers up punching moves.

abilities.name: poison-heal
abilities.text_entry: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.text_entry: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

abilities.name: skill-link
abilities.text_entry: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.

abilities.name: hydration
abilities.text_entry: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.

abilities.name: quick-feet
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

abilities.name: normalize
abilities.text_entry: All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.text_entry: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

abilities.name: magic-guard
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

abilities.name: no-guard
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

abilities.name: stall
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.text_entry: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

abilities.name: leaf-guard
abilities.text_entry: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: klutz
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

abilities.name: mold-breaker
abilities.text_entry: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

abilities.name: super-luck
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.text_entry: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.

abilities.name: anticipation
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

abilities.name: forewarn
abilities.text_entry: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.text_entry: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon’s stat changes.

abilities.name: tinted-lens
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

abilities.name: filter
abilities.text_entry: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

abilities.name: slow-start
abilities.text_entry: For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

abilities.name: scrappy
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

abilities.name: storm-drain
abilities.text_entry: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit  by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: solid-rock
abilities.text_entry: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

abilities.name: snow-warning
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: honey-gather
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

abilities.name: frisk
abilities.text_entry: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.

abilities.name: reckless
abilities.text_entry: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

abilities.name: multitype
abilities.text_entry: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

abilities.name: flower-gift
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: bad-dreams
abilities.text_entry: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

abilities.name: pickpocket
abilities.text_entry: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

abilities.name: sheer-force
abilities.text_entry: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

abilities.name: contrary
abilities.text_entry: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

abilities.name: unnerve
abilities.text_entry: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: defiant
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

abilities.name: defeatist
abilities.text_entry: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.text_entry: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: healer
abilities.text_entry: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.text_entry: Reduces damage done to allies.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.text_entry: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

abilities.name: heavy-metal
abilities.text_entry: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.

abilities.name: light-metal
abilities.text_entry: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.

abilities.name: multiscale
abilities.text_entry: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.

abilities.name: toxic-boost
abilities.text_entry: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

abilities.name: flare-boost
abilities.text_entry: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

abilities.name: harvest
abilities.text_entry: May create another Berry after one is used.

abilities.name: telepathy
abilities.text_entry: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

abilities.name: moody
abilities.text_entry: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

abilities.name: overcoat
abilities.text_entry: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

abilities.name: poison-touch
abilities.text_entry: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: regenerator
abilities.text_entry: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

abilities.name: big-pecks
abilities.text_entry: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.

abilities.name: sand-rush
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: wonder-skin
abilities.text_entry: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.text_entry: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

abilities.name: illusion
abilities.text_entry: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party’s last spot.

abilities.name: imposter
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.text_entry: Passes through the opposing Pokémon’s barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

abilities.name: mummy
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: justified
abilities.text_entry: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.

abilities.name: rattled
abilities.text_entry: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.

abilities.name: magic-bounce
abilities.text_entry: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.

abilities.name: prankster
abilities.text_entry: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: iron-barbs
abilities.text_entry: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.

abilities.name: zen-mode
abilities.text_entry: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is half or less.

abilities.name: victory-star
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

abilities.name: turboblaze
abilities.text_entry: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

abilities.name: teravolt
abilities.text_entry: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

abilities.name: aroma-veil
abilities.text_entry: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

abilities.name: flower-veil
abilities.text_entry: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.text_entry: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

abilities.name: protean
abilities.text_entry: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

abilities.name: fur-coat
abilities.text_entry: Halves the damage from physical moves.

abilities.name: magician
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

abilities.name: bulletproof
abilities.text_entry: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

abilities.name: strong-jaw
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

abilities.name: refrigerate
abilities.text_entry: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

abilities.name: sweet-veil
abilities.text_entry: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: stance-change
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King’s Shield.

abilities.name: gale-wings
abilities.text_entry: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the  Pokémon’s HP is full.

abilities.name: mega-launcher
abilities.text_entry: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

abilities.name: grass-pelt
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat in  Grassy Terrain.

abilities.name: symbiosis
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

abilities.name: tough-claws
abilities.text_entry: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

abilities.name: pixilate
abilities.text_entry: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

abilities.name: gooey
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

abilities.name: aerilate
abilities.text_entry: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

abilities.name: parental-bond
abilities.text_entry: Parent and child each attacks.

abilities.name: dark-aura
abilities.text_entry: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.

abilities.name: fairy-aura
abilities.text_entry: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.

abilities.name: aura-break
abilities.text_entry: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

abilities.name: primordial-sea
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

abilities.name: desolate-land
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

abilities.name: delta-stream
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

abilities.name: stamina
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

abilities.name: wimp-out
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

abilities.name: emergency-exit
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

abilities.name: water-compaction
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: merciless
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: shields-down
abilities.text_entry: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

abilities.name: stakeout
abilities.text_entry: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.

abilities.name: water-bubble
abilities.text_entry: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: steelworker
abilities.text_entry: Powers up Steel-type moves.

abilities.name: berserk
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

abilities.name: slush-rush
abilities.text_entry: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: long-reach
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

abilities.name: liquid-voice
abilities.text_entry: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

abilities.name: triage
abilities.text_entry: Gives priority to a healing move.

abilities.name: galvanize
abilities.text_entry: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

abilities.name: surge-surfer
abilities.text_entry: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

abilities.name: schooling
abilities.text_entry: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

abilities.name: disguise
abilities.text_entry: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

abilities.name: battle-bond
abilities.text_entry: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

abilities.name: power-construct
abilities.text_entry: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

abilities.name: corrosion
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.

abilities.name: comatose
abilities.text_entry: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

abilities.name: queenly-majesty
abilities.text_entry: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

abilities.name: innards-out
abilities.text_entry: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

abilities.name: dancer
abilities.text_entry: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

abilities.name: battery
abilities.text_entry: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

abilities.name: fluffy
abilities.text_entry: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: dazzling
abilities.text_entry: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

abilities.name: soul-heart
abilities.text_entry: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

abilities.name: tangling-hair
abilities.text_entry: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

abilities.name: receiver
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

abilities.name: power-of-alchemy
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

abilities.name: beast-boost
abilities.text_entry: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

abilities.name: rks-system
abilities.text_entry: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

abilities.name: electric-surge
abilities.text_entry: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: psychic-surge
abilities.text_entry: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: misty-surge
abilities.text_entry: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: grassy-surge
abilities.text_entry: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: full-metal-body
abilities.text_entry: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

abilities.name: shadow-shield
abilities.text_entry: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

abilities.name: prism-armor
abilities.text_entry: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

abilities.name: neuroforce
abilities.text_entry: Powers up moves that are super effective.
